Straight Shot nods quietly as she too leaves the area to rejoin the others =
in the main cabin of the Ark. 

" Sure maybe I can access the intel from on=
e of the data terminals."

While in the bridge with Lord Elder, Uproar and =
Quickstride try to vouch for Perceptor to prove that he could be trusted.  =
They look to Torca and Noctoro with a reassuring grin on their muzzles.  Qu=
ickstride chimes in first.

"It's okay guys, if Perceptor was gonna pull a =
fast one on us, he would have done it by now.  I think it's safe to say tha=
t he's officially on our side."

Uproar nods in agreement.

" I second that=
.  As we stand here right now, thanks to Perceptor, Nightlight is coming ba=
ck online.  He didn't have to do that but he did and a good deed is worth a=
 lot."

Sent from my iPhone
